title: Is there a way to get my Client Logo Back without Reinstalling
body:
I tried Repairing and it didn't work. I also tried to change logo, which it has as the right logo and saved. But, when I saved it, it just just goes back to the white Shortcut that is the standard for unknown file Location. However When I open the Shortcut it works. Seems to be a Windows 10 Pro Error and not League Specific. Any Professionals out there know how to fix it without complete uninstall and reinstall? If I don't get a response back.. I'll just reinstall it tonight before I go to sleep.

http://i.imgur.com/Uv9jmxH.png

replies.body: ok I'm really dumb I coulda figured that out hoelee mowlee thx. Ya it was a windows pathing error, wasn't associating the logo but it was associating the path. I just loaded the image that the shortcut path goes to, that's a really silly issue lol, so silly... that I didn't even think about it LOL. Thank You! :)

Try grabbing a new shortcut and see if that works, as well as verifying that you still have League installed.  :x

- Navigate to your League of Legends installation folder. (Typically C:\Riot Games\League of Legends
- Open the client by using "lol.launcher.admin.exe"

Let me know if that helps.
ok thx I'm going to see right now
